CustomField.description:
If the nego scope is not the whole supplier (Is_all is negative) and not the All Brands (Is_all_BU negative).
This detail that any new Business Unit coming for the supplier will be included by default in this nego scope.
If no, and the user want to include one new Business Unit in this scope, he will have the select manually the new BU in the scope to include it.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Préciser si la future Business Unit liée au fournisseur doit être automatiquement incluse dans ce périmètre de négociation.
CustomField.label: Include New BU
